sentences.en: Any unexpected circumstance that arises may catalyze a sudden escalation of violence.
sentences.cn: 任何突如其来的情况都可能造成暴力骤然升级。

sentences.en: Communal violence broke out in different parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 在该国不同的地区发生了群体暴力事件。

sentences.en: He demanded exemplary sentences for those behind the violence.
sentences.cn: 他要求对这起暴力事件的幕后指使者作出惩戒性判决。

sentences.en: He was the fifth person to be killed in sectarian violence.
sentences.cn: 他是宗派暴力中的第5个罹难者。

sentences.en: He's a judo black belt but he says he deplores violence.
sentences.cn: 他是一名柔道黑带选手，但他说自己强烈反对暴力。

sentences.en: John seemed as horrified as I about his potential for violence.
sentences.cn: 约翰似乎和我一样害怕他自己会使用暴力。

sentences.en: Many viewers have strong opinions about violence on the screen.
sentences.cn: 许多观众对银幕暴力心存反感。

sentences.en: Nearly 2,500 have died in separatist violence this year.
sentences.cn: 近2,500人在今年的分裂主义暴乱中丧生。

sentences.en: Non-violence and patience are the central tenets of their faith.
sentences.cn: 非暴力和忍耐是他们的信仰的核心原则。

sentences.en: Police are out in force to prevent a recurrence of the violence.
sentences.cn: 警方出动大量警力防止暴力事件再次发生。

sentences.en: She spoke with a violence that surprised them both.
sentences.cn: 她言辞激烈，令他们俩都很惊讶。

sentences.en: Television broadcasters were warned to exercise caution over depicting scenes of violence.
sentences.cn: 电视台受到警告，要求对暴力场面的描绘采取谨慎态度。

sentences.en: The violence in her tone gave Alistair a shock.
sentences.cn: 她语气之强烈令阿利斯泰尔深感震惊。

sentences.en: The violence in those films was too unreal, it was make-believe.
sentences.cn: 那些影片里的暴力场面太不真实了，都是假的。

sentences.en: There are problems of urban decay and gang violence.
sentences.cn: 存在城市衰败和帮派暴力的问题。

sentences.en: There is too much sex and violence on TV these days.
sentences.cn: 如今电视上性爱和暴力场面太多。

sentences.en: This evidence supports their contention that the outbreak of violence was prearranged.
sentences.cn: 这一证据证实了他们的观点，即此次突发暴力事件是有预谋的。

words.tran_cn: 易受侵犯的；可亵渎的；可违反的

phrases.tran_cn: 家庭暴力；家庭暴力事件

trans.tran_cn: 暴力，暴行，（言行的）狂暴，激烈，愤怒
trans.tran_en: behaviour that is intended to hurt other people physically
